attributes.action: Revoke article 50, renegotiate EU reforms and have a new referendum
attributes.additional_details: The margin to leave the EU was small and our politicians have failed to find a way to exit. Therefore, it makes sense to find a way to stay that the majority of the population are happy with.
attributes.background: I don’t believe in a repeat of the EU referendum with the same terms.  I believe that the EU voted to leave the EU because David Cameron failed to negotiate serious EU reforms.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what reforms you would like the UK to pursue within the EU.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to see happen.
